casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Vallestero, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Vallestero v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 88 Ohio St.3d 390.]

(No. 97-631 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided October 14, 1998.) Fell, Marcus & Koder Co., L.PA, and George N. Fell II, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Constance A Snyder, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., dissents.
